text: Victor Roe Eaton (born January 3, 1933) is a former American football player who played for Pittsburgh Steelers of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at the University of Missouri. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Players of American football from Missouri Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Missouri Tigers football players Category:People from Savannah, Missouri
title: Vic Eaton
